content:
This forum is the only official support there is. There is no phone, text or email support, although responses on the forum are emailed to the registered email address.

Posting phone numbers and email addresses is actually a breach of the forum terms of use, so I will remove them.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
I am guessing you are not using the same anti virus product and settings as that is the cause of something like 99% of sending errors.

I am of course guessing as you have not provided any information at all about your mail provider or the error message you receive telling you you can not send mail.
creator: MattAuSupport
